page.title: 03Three local schools
page.content: Children in this area begin their { {Education}at one of 3 local schools. {Chase lane}school is only 19 years old,and was built to cater for those who live in the area of Upper Dovercourt.{Ramsey}school is also a primary school,taking pupils from the village of Ramsey itself,and also those children who have reached junior age in Little Oakley.These are collected each morning by a bus which then drops them off at school,and collects them in the evening. In{Little Oakley}there is a tiny C of E infants school,which was built in 1845;although it's first teacher(Miss S.Turner)was not recorded until 1875.Originally it had one room plus accomodation for the teacher.It now has two teachers and 31 pupils,and because it is such an important part of the village will be kept open.
